root.name: SNK Arcade Classics V.1
root.description: OverviewSNK Arcade Classics Volume 1 is a compilation of 16 popular SNK games from its earlier days.GamesArt of Fighting Baseball Stars 2 Burning Fight Fatal Fury King of Fighters 94 King of the Monsters Last Resort Magician Lord Metal Slug Neo Turf Masters Samurai Shodown Sengoku Shock Troopers Super Sidekicks 3 Top Hunter World Heroes

similar_games.game: Midway's Greatest Arcade Hits Volume I
